import React from"react";import{useState,useEffect}from"react";import LoginPage from"./pages/Login";// or "pages/Login" if using absolute imports
import Dashboards from"./pages/DashboardPage";import{jsx as _jsx,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){const[isLoggedIn,setIsLoggedIn]=useState(false);const token=localStorage.getItem("token");useEffect(()=>{if(token){setIsLoggedIn(true);}},[token]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(_Fragment,{children:isLoggedIn?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Dashboards,{onLogout:()=>setIsLoggedIn(false)}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(LoginPage,{onLoginSuccess:()=>setIsLoggedIn(true)})});}export default App;
